definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: (late) appointed time, time (Ar. zamanun, Eth. zman: BAram. Targum [[זְמַן]], but Syr. zabno0, Mand. [[זיבנא]], Sam. zbn, Palm. [[זבנא]], cf. Reckendorf:ZMG 1888, 394)—sg. [[זְמָָן]] Ne 2:6, Ec 3:1; sf. [[וְכִזְמַנׇּ֑ם]] Es 9:27, [[בִּזְמַנֵּיהֶם]] v:Es 9:31, (on Dagh. cf. Ges:§ 20. 2, c).
